Sections.Name: GeneralSettings
Sections.Description: Related To General Settings For The Mod

Keys.Name: AllowHudHiding
Keys.Description: Allows Mod To Hide HUD Elements || Default = True

Sections.Name: HudHidingSettings
Sections.Description: Related To Hiding Specific HUD Elements

Keys.Name: HideEverything
Keys.Description: Hides Every Vanilla HUD Element || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideCompass
Keys.Description: Hides Vanilla HUD Compass || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideVitals
Keys.Description: Hides Vanilla Health, Mana, And Fatigue Bars || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideCrosshair
Keys.Description: Hides Vanilla Crosshair In The Middle Of The Screen || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideInteractionModeIcon
Keys.Description: Hides Small Currently Active Interaction Mode Icon || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideActiveSpells
Keys.Description: Hides Currently Active Spell Effect Icons Or Buffs/Debuffs || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideArrowCount
Keys.Description: Hides Small Counter Of Arrows Currently In Inventory || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideBreathBar
Keys.Description: Hides Remaining Breath/Oxygen Bar When Underwater || Default = False

Keys.Name: HidePopupText
Keys.Description: Hides Popup Text Usually Near The Top Of The Screen || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideMidScreenText
Keys.Description: Hides Text That Can Sometimes Appears Below Or Near The Crosshair || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideEscortingFaces
Keys.Description: Hides NPC HUD Faces That Can Appear During Certain Quests || Default = False

Keys.Name: HideLocalQuestPlaces
Keys.Description: Hides Quest Debug Text If Using The Ingame Quest Debugging Tools || Default = False

Sections.Name: MiscSettings
Sections.Description: Related To Misc Settings And Options

Keys.Name: EnableKeyPressQuickToggle
Keys.Description: Allows Quick Toggle Of HUD Visibility By Using The Keybind Below || Default = False

Keys.Name: QuickToggleKey
Keys.Description: Keybind Used To Quick Toggle Visibility Of HUD Elements || Default = O
